title: SLR Lightroom Workshop Collection
description:
THE GOLD STANDARD IN LIGHTROOM EDUCATION & RESOURCES

This Lightroom Workshop Collection has been designed from the ground up tot provide the best hands-on education and resources for mastering every facet of Lightroom.


1) Taught by the Editor in Chief of SLR Lounge, Pye Jirsa (A.K.A. Post Production Pye), the collection stars with Lightroom Organization and Workflow DVD - This DVD teaches you the basics of image management and shows you how to process your images faster and more efficient.

2) Lightroom Image Processing Mastery DVD - This DVD teaches you how to master image processing in Lightroom, from basics like color correction and black and white conversion to advanced techniques like HDR, tilt-shift, and vintage fades.

3) Lightroom Preset System v5 - This has been widely recognized as the best preset system for Lightroom. Intuitive yet robust, this allows you to achieve amazing results in just a few clicks.

Together, we call this system the Lightroom Workshop Collection, and it gives you all of the education and tools needed for any photographer (of any experience level) to run a full studio using Lightroom. 

This Collection includes

3 DVDs, 170 Videos and nearly 25 hours of hands-on training

145 RAW images, workflow checklists and other exercise files

Full HD 1080p resolution videos with on-screen shortcut tool-tips

Browser based player featuring a full menu for quick navigation

Designed for Lightroom 4,5,and 6 users
